text: The 2003 Tour de Hongrie was the 30th edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 29 July to 3 August 2003. The race started in Veszprém and finished in Budapest. The race was won by Zoltán Remák. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | P Nívó-Betonexpressz-FTC | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Slovakia | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 04" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | Joko-Velamos | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 01" |} |} ==References== 2003 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
